feed.title: Track Awesome Rtc Updates Weekly
feed.subtitle: :satellite: A curated list of awesome Real Time Communications resources

entry.title: Awesome Rtc Updates on Mar 28 - Apr 03, 2022
entry.content:
Server Software / Media Servers

  • Jitsi - A collection of RTC open source projects, with a focus on conferencing software.

Operations / Monitoring

  • WebRTC Troubleshooter (⭐486) - Self-hosted one stop client-side WebRTC troubleshooter.

Operations / Testing

  • sipexer (⭐350) - Modern and flexible SIP command line tool.

Operations / Deployment

  • slimswitch (⭐20) - Tooling for creating lean secure FreeSWITCH Docker images.

Operations / Web/API Interfaces

  • Eqivo - Open source programmable-voice/telephony API platform.
  • Fonoster (⭐6.7k) - Telecommunication stack built with Node.js.
  • Wazo - VoIP API platform built on top of Asterisk, Kamailio and RTPEngine.
  • jambonz - Open source CPaaS built for communications service providers.
  • IVOZ Provider (⭐208) - Multitenant solution for VoIP telephony providers.

Developer Resources / C/C++ Libraries

  • Sofia-SIP (⭐300) - Open source SIP library used by FreeSWITCH.

Events / Dart Libraries

  • CommCon - Annual conference held in the UK focused on telecommunications in general and WebRTC in particular.
  • FOSDEM - Free event for software developers, with a RTC component, held every year in Europe.
  • JanusCon - JanusCon is a live event for Janus and RTC implementers.
  • TADHack - Global hackathon focused on programmable communications.

Related Lists / Dart Libraries

  • SIP Resources (⭐231) - Useful SIP resources curated by Kamailio's head developer.
entry.summary: 15 awesome projects updated on Mar 28 - Apr 03, 2022

entry.title: Awesome Rtc Updates on Nov 16 - Nov 22, 2020
entry.content:
Related Lists / Dart Libraries

  • Awesome RIPT (⭐28) - Real Time Internet Peering for Telephony.
  • Awesome RTC Hacking (⭐472) - Real Time Communications hacking and penetration testing resources.
  • Awesome 5G (⭐820) - 5G frameworks, libraries, software and resources.
  • Awesome Cellular Hacking (⭐3.3k) - Research resources in the 3G/4G/5G Cellular security space.
  • Awesome Telco (⭐800) - Telco resources and projects.
entry.summary: 5 awesome projects updated on Nov 16 - Nov 22, 2020

entry.title: Awesome Rtc Updates on Nov 02 - Nov 08, 2020
entry.content:
Developer Resources / C/C++ Libraries

  • libre (⭐537) - Portable SIP Stack along with companion libraries for media handling, STUN/TURN and a modular user agent.

Developer Resources / PHP Libraries

  • RTCKit/SIP (⭐41) - RFC 3261 compliant SIP parsing and rendering library for PHP 7.4+.
entry.summary: 2 awesome projects updated on Nov 02 - Nov 08, 2020

entry.title: Awesome Rtc Updates on Mar 23 - Mar 29, 2020
entry.content:
Server Software / SIP Servers

  • Flexisip (⭐167) - SIP server suite comprising proxy, presence and group chat functions.

Developer Resources / Rust Libraries

  • libsip - SIP implementation, with a focus towards softphone clients.
  • sipcore (⭐31) - Rust framework for creating SIP applications.
  • rtcrs/webrtc (⭐4.6k) - WebRTC stack, supporting SDP, RTP, RTCP and SRTP.

Developer Resources / Dart Libraries

  • dart-sip-ua (⭐358) - Dart-lang port of JsSIP, capable of SIP over WebSocket.
entry.summary: 5 awesome projects updated on Mar 23 - Mar 29, 2020

entry.title: Awesome Rtc Updates on Mar 16 - Mar 22, 2020
entry.content:
Developer Resources / JavaScript Libraries

  • PeerJS - Data and media peer-to-peer connection API implemented over WebRTC.

Developer Resources / Python Libraries

  • peerjs-python (⭐94) - Python port of the PeerJS peer-to-peer connection library.
entry.summary: 2 awesome projects updated on Mar 16 - Mar 22, 2020

entry.title: Awesome Rtc Updates on Feb 17 - Feb 23, 2020
entry.content:
Operations / Monitoring

  • SIP3 - VoIP & RTC traffic monitoring and analysis platform.

entry.title: Awesome Rtc Updates on Feb 10 - Feb 16, 2020
entry.content:
Developer Resources / Tutorials

  • Official Website - Entry level WebRTC resources.

entry.title: Awesome Rtc Updates on Nov 25 - Dec 01, 2019
entry.content:
Server Software / General Purpose

  • FreeSWITCH - Open source multi-protocol, cross-platform and software switch.
  • Asterisk - PBX framework supporting multiple protocols and platforms.

Server Software / SIP Servers

  • Kamailio - Open source SIP server widely deployed by carriers and providers. Formerly known as OpenSER.
  • OpenSIPS - Open source SIP server, tracing its roots in OpenSER (presently Kamailio).
  • Routr - Lightweight SIP proxy, location server, and registrar written in Node.js.
  • Sippy B2BUA (⭐188) - Back-to-back user agent server written in Python.

Server Software / Media Servers

  • Janus - Lightweight open source, general purpose, WebRTC gateway.
  • RTPProxy - General purpose high performance RTP proxy.
  • RTP:Engine (⭐859) - RTP and UDP based media traffic proxy, usable as a kernel module.
  • mediasoup - Specialized WebRTC conferencing system.
  • SEMS (⭐170) - Open source media and application server for SIP based VoIP services.

Server Software / STUN/TURN

  • coturn (⭐13k) - Fully featured TURN/STUN server supporting multiple platforms.
  • STUNTMAN (⭐1.5k) - RFC compliant open source STUN implementation.

Operations / Monitoring

  • sngrep (⭐1.1k) - Terminal based SIP flow viewer.
  • sipgrep (⭐169) - Console tool for sniffing, capturing and exploring SIP traffic.
  • rtpbreak (⭐22) - Detect, reconstruct and analyze RTP sessions.
  • HOMER (⭐1.8k) - Multi-protocol capturing and monitoring framework for RTC.
  • Trickle ICE - Exposes client-side NAT traversal debug data.

Operations / Testing

  • SIPp - Traffic generator for the SIP protocol.
  • SIPVicious (⭐967) - Suite of security tools that can be used to audit SIP based VoIP systems.
  • sipsak (⭐162) - SIP stress and diagnostics utility.

Operations / Web/API Interfaces

  • Kazoo - Carrier-grade VoIP API platform using FreeSWITCH and Kamailio.
  • FusionPBX - Multitenant system built on top of FreeSWITCH.
  • FreePBX - Web Manager for Asterisk.

Operations / Billing

  • CGRateS - Carrier grade open source billing/rating server.
  • A2Billing - Billing system for Asterisk for multiple applications.
  • PyFreeBilling (⭐104) - Wholesale billing platform for Kamailio and FreeSWITCH.

Developer Resources / Tutorials

  • Getting Started With WebRTC - WebRTC tutorial by HTML5 Rocks.
  • WebRTC Samples - Collection of samples demonstrating various parts of the WebRTC APIs.
  • WebRTC Experiments - Comprehensive list of samples by Muaz Khan.
  • Interactive Codelab - 30 minutes step by step live tutorial by Google.

Developer Resources / JavaScript Libraries

  • drachtio - Node.js SIP server framework.
  • adapter.js (⭐3.7k) - JavaScript shim for abstracting WebRTC spec changes and inconsistencies.
  • JsSIP - Lightweight open source JavaScript SIP library.
  • sipML5 - Open source JavaScript SIP client with WebRTC media stack.
  • simple-peer (⭐7.7k) - WebRTC video, voice, and data channels abstraction for Node.js and the browser.
  • Netflux (⭐215) - Isomorphic JavaScript peer to peer transport API for client and server.

Developer Resources / C/C++ Libraries

  • PJSIP - Multi-protocol RTC library written in C.
  • eXosip - eXtended osip is a mature C library for abstracting the SIP protocol.
  • libdatachannel (⭐2.1k) - Standalone WebRTC DataChannels C++ implementation.
  • libSRTP (⭐1.3k) - Secure Real-time Transport Protocol (SRTP) library for C.
  • usrsctp (⭐717) - Portable Stream Control Transmission Protocol (SCTP) user-land stack.
  • rawrtc (⭐387) - WebRTC and ORTC library with a small footprint.
  • OSS Core (⭐26) - General purpose C++ library for Real Time Communications.
  • Open WebRTC Toolkit - WebRTC development toolkit with bindings for multiple platforms.

Developer Resources / Go Libraries

  • Pion - Extensive software stack for WebRTC written in Go.
  • gossip (⭐343) - SIP stack for stateful user agents written in Go.
  • siprocket (⭐72) - Fast SIP and SDP packet parser.
  • go-diameter (⭐267) - RFC compliant Diameter protocol library.

Developer Resources / Python Libraries

  • aiortc (⭐4.7k) - WebRTC and ORTC implementation for Python using asyncio.
  • Katari (⭐3) - SIP stack application framework.

Developer Resources / Erlang Libraries

  • NkSIP (⭐364) - Extendable SIP server framework.
  • ersip (⭐128) - Library comprising building blocks for SIP applications.

Blogs / Dart Libraries

  • BlogGeekMe - Blog by Tsahi Levent-Levi with a strong focus on WebRTC.
  • SIP Adventures - Unified communications blog by Andrew Prokop.
  • WebRTCHacks - WebRTC blog by independent technologists.

Discussion / Dart Libraries

  • FreeSWITCH Slack - Join #freeswitch and #freeswitch-dev for user and developer support.
  • discuss-webrtc - Developer oriented Google Group for WebRTC discussions.

Events / Dart Libraries

  • ClueCon - Annual conference held in Chicago for telecommunications developers. Birthplace of FreeSWITCH.
  • Kamailio World - Berlin hosted annual event focused on Kamailio as well as VoIP, WebRTC, IMS, VoLTE and more.
  • AstriCon - Asterisk focus event held every year across the US.
  • OpenSIPS Summit - Meeting place for the OpenSIPS community.
  • Kranky Geek - AI and RTC event in San Francisco.
entry.summary: 63 awesome projects updated on Nov 25 - Dec 01, 2019
